title: Himi 551
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Tama tūtuu’i, ē,
‘Alu, ‘o fai ho nafa:
Tō ‘i he ngaahi laumālie
‘A e ta’u he Pule’anga.
2.
‘Alu ‘o laku noa,
Fai ki he ve’ehala,
Tō ‘i he ngoue fu’u vaoa,
He potu makamaka.
3.
‘Oua ‘e loto fo’i,
‘Oua ‘e ofo fau,
Ka tātātaha ho’ ‘ilo’i
‘A e kelekele mahu.
4.
‘Oku a’au ke maʻu,
Mo tō ‘a e pulopula;
‘Oku ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘o e Ta’u
‘A hono fakafua.
5.
Fai, pea ‘oua e tuku,
Fai ‘aho mo e pō;
‘Oua ke hifo hono utu
Kau ngāue ‘āngelo.
6.
Pea ke ‘ilo pau
‘A e tupu mo e mole
He kātoanga ‘o e ta’u;
Kae fakapale koe.*
